title: 111_hr1763
content: Responsible Reinvestment Act of 2009 - Makes permanent the repeal of the estate tax. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase to $500,000 the maximum expensing allowance for depreciable business assets, (2) allow first-year expensing of manufacturing and agricultural property. (3) allow a 20 tax deduction for qualified small business income. (4) allow a deduction from self-employment income for health insurance, health savings account contributions, and simplified employee pension plan contributions. And (5) increase the limit on the tax deduction for contributions to a simplified employee pension plan.
